title: South Africa's Heated Election & Sexist 2020 Coverage | Mark Jonathan Harris & Deborah Oppenheimer
itunes:title: South Africa's Heated Election & Sexist 2020 Coverage | Mark Jonathan Harris & Deborah Oppenheimer
description:
Trevor covers South Africa's high-stakes election, Desi Lydic reacts to sexist 2020 U.S. election coverage, and Mark Jonathan Harris and Deborah Oppenheimer discuss "Foster."
